;You , do you really want to resign?

;
;
;
;
; Rabbit grass answer
;
;

;

;;
;

;Speaking of it, as a As a social worker with more than ten years of work experience, I am a legendary "habitual offender of resignation." The most exaggerated time was when I cursed my immediate boss with a curse word in the office, and then left the same day without ever returning to work. Bit.

;

;Looking back now, the eyes my colleagues looked at me that day were full of complex emotions such as confusion, admiration, and surprise. After I scolded the director, I remembered that my probation period was less than one month, so my salary might be withheld and not paid.

;

;In fact, most people who are not deeply involved in the world have great expectations for their lives before entering the workplace. Since when did we start saying "going to work is like visiting a grave"? When did we start feeling anxious on Sunday afternoons and desperate to think about going to work on Monday?

;

;Marx made such a profound statement in the "Economic and Philosophical Manuscripts of 1844" - "Workers do not affirm themselves in their labor, but deny themselves. They do not feel To be happy is to feel unhappy, not to freely exert one's physical strength and intelligence, but to torture one's body and destroy one's spirit...The result is that people can only use their animal functions, such as eating, drinking, living, etc. When you are waiting, you feel that you are moving freely; but when you are using your human functions, you feel that you are just an animal. ”;

;

;This is the so-called "alienation" from work, which is the essential reason why most people want to resign - not feeling any value at work The feeling is repeated, repeated, repeated every day. ;As the economic situation becomes more and more severe and involution intensifies, working hours become longer and longer, which makes people feel as if they are at work as soon as they open their eyes, and exhausted after work. , can’t find any motivation to do anything else.

;

;However, although almost every worker talks about "wanting to resign", there are very few people who actually do it. The reasons are nothing more than the following three points.

;

; 

;

;;1. People who have limited economic conditions and go to work just to earn "consumption money";;

;

;Living in big cities Young people have to face high expenses every day when they open their eyes. They have to pay rent and spend money on food. After all, their wages seem to be enough for their normal survival.

;

;;Wanting to resign but having no money is the normal life of most social workers. ;

;

;There are also some middle-aged people who are old and young. They are the best people to be "manipulated" in the workplace, even if they want to resign ten thousand times in their hearts. , when facing work, you still have to weigh the weights in your hands.

;

;; ;

;

;;2. Losing your job will lead to social difficulties;

;

;There are many in big cities Working young people dare not tell their parents in their hometown the truth after losing their jobs, so they can only hide it. If your parents think that you go to a big city to get a good job and make a lot of money, but if you suddenly say that you want to resign, their emotions will usually be very extreme and intense.

;

;Sometimes, even if you don’t care about work, people around you will always ask you what you are doing. Therefore, many people start looking for a job as soon as they resign, or even start looking for a horse before resigning, for fear of being questioned during the "window period" in the workplace.

;

;Resigning is not a panacea for making life better. On the contrary, sometimes, resigning will bring about financial losses and turbulence in life. Many people resign with certainty, but also take action, within two days of resignation. Just crying and having an emotional breakdown in a rented house is not worth the gain.

;

; 

;

;Think about it, why did you resign?

;

; 

;

;;1. Seeking better development;

;

;If you feel that you are stuck in your current company or are being held back, Then you can find a new company while you are still young.

;

;In the process of searching, it is best to ride the donkey to find the horse, because you do not hate the job itself, but just hate the company you work for. ;The current economic situation is sluggish, and having a job is better than not having one. Therefore, it is important to take one step at a time and assess the situation. ;

;

; 

;

;;2. My physical and mental health is hindered and I really can’t stand it anymore ;

;

;I used to be in I got depressed while working in an advertising agency, and even developed a small tumor on my body. Faced with this situation, this class really couldn't last a day. So I decided to resign immediately. The reason for resigning is also very simple, that is, my health is not good.

;

;After I resigned, I recuperated for a while. After I recovered, I stopped looking for a job that required overtime.

;

; 

;

;;3. Purely hate the workplace and hate going to work;

;

;In this case, it is actually more troublesome , because people have to spend money to live, and if they want to spend money, they have to find ways to make money. Without a certain financial foundation, it is difficult to not go to work or work at all.

;

;It is important to adjust your mentality, and it is also important to accumulate funds for yourself for rest. If you really hate going to work, you might as well try freelancing. In the process, you can measure and compare whether you have the ability to completely leave the company and survive independently.

;

;
;

;

;There are many times when we say we want to resign, but in fact we never take action for a moment. However, in the long-term ideological pull, we will fall into internal friction. The process is like being in a relationship that has no results. You feel that being stuck with your current job is "tasteless, a pity to abandon", but you don't have enough courage to take action.

;

;;The most painful thing about everything is swinging between two sides, whether it is emotion or work. ;

;

;So, before shouting "I want to resign" next time, first think about whether you are just "acting like a baby" because you are tired of work, or whether you are really on the verge of collapse. ;Deeds are far better than words, anytime and anywhere. ;

;

;Li Mu, a writer who encountered a bottleneck in his creation, turned his life into When used as writing material, the boundary between reality and fiction wandered in his mind. When adapting a novel based on a real case, two bullets, like echoes of the past, penetrated his memory.

;
;

;
;

;

;A bullet comes out of the barrel and explodes together with a firecracker that flips and falls at the highest point in the silent night before the New Year. Sound, joy mixed with sadness - I wrote this at the beginning of the novel. As usual, the editor responsible for review will reply to me within these two days.

;

;On this day, the fifth day of the twelfth lunar month, the first message came from Wang Yu. We had been separated for a while, and we had not contacted each other in the meantime. When I met her, she was selling insurance. I fell in love with her simply because she looked good. I regarded her as my girlfriend, and she regarded me as my scapegoat. Every time we met, she would introduce the insurance business to me within three sentences. , critical illness insurance, personal accident insurance, family property insurance, all kinds of assumptions, all kinds of plans, it feels like I am going to die at any time, she said, be prepared for a rainy day, life is too impermanent. The third to last time we met before we broke up was at the Jiutian Hotel in front of the Chemical Engineering Vocational School. We were pretending to be Seven Days, but we didn’t even take off our clothes, so they told me that there was a woman who was diagnosed with invasive breast cancer a few days ago and bought Our insurance paid out 500,000 yuan. Look, how good our life is. I immediately softened and said, Wang Yu, is there something wrong with you? Later I put on my clothes and left. After we broke up, I occasionally browsed her Moments and it was filled with insurance advertisements. I even suspected that I had added her work number at that time.

;

;She asked me if I was there. I wasn’t sure what I was going to say next, so I didn’t reply. The call came half an hour later. I hesitated for a moment but answered it. She said: "The big boss is busy." What, you don’t have time to reply to the message? ”

;

;I said impatiently: “I didn’t see it, you are talking about something and don’t buy insurance. ”

;

;She said: “If I don’t sell insurance, I’ll quit. I’m asking you to do me a favor. ”

;

;My heart trembled and I said: "Say it first, I can't guarantee that I can agree. Although we have had a relationship, it has been a while. Don't take a moment as forever." . ”

;

;She snorted disdainfully and said, “I see, the person I am talking about is you. It's not a big deal, my mom wants to meet you. ”

;

;“Why? ”

;

;“There are not many days left. I have two wishes before leaving. One is to find my dad, you know, and the second is to bring her a son-in-law back. There is basically no hope for the first one, so we can only satisfy the second one. After all, we have been together before, and with this kind of relationship, she should not be able to see any flaws. ”

;

;“Lend me two thousand yuan, money is a little tight recently. ”

;

;She hummed, the deal was concluded.

;

;After hanging up the phone, her appearance appeared in my mind unconsciously. She was of medium height, but tall among girls, with long, dyed hair, brown, and big eyes. She has a high nose bridge, fair skin, and slim curves. She is upturned where she should be, and concave where she should be. Thinking of this, she felt that her bladder was filled with discomfort. She ran to the toilet and recalled the first time between the two of them. In her rental house, the opposite person was a beef. There is a hot pot restaurant with a colorful couplet hanging on both sides of the door. One side says "men's gas station" and the other side says "women's beauty salon." These words gave me strength, but in the end I couldn't use it very well. I made haste and analyzed it afterwards. It was mainly because when I was holding her, she told me that when you are over thirty, you still have to buy insurance.

;

;I peed while standing, and the urine was foaming with white foam. It was a good idea to scoop up a cup of fake beer. Come to think of it, I have basically said goodbye to beer. Last year, when my dad was hospitalized, I took a physical examination and found out that high uric acid was high. If it is not controlled, the consequences will be serious. As for how serious it is, the doctor did not say clearly. I will check myself after I come back. , with lingering fears.

;

;Counting this time, she asked me to help her three times in total. The first one was to buy an insurance, but I ignored it. The second one was to ask me to help her find out the whereabouts of her father. Because I said I knew the police. We were still in a relationship at that time. She said that her father’s name was Wang Jun, who disappeared in 2012. On the day of his disappearance, he was wearing a black polo shirt, a pair of navy jeans, and a pair of Peak sneakers. Apart from that, she Dad is 1.72 meters tall, has a short head, dark skin, a slightly hunched back, and a scar above his eyebrow bone. I said, first of all, your dad has been missing for almost ten years, so inquiries must be timely. Secondly, your dad’s name is too random. Not to mention the whole country, if you walk around the city south and north, you will be suffocated if you drop a stick. Wang Jun, why did you get such a fucking name?

;

;Not long after, the phone received several WeChat messages in succession. It was still Wang Yu. Her online name was "Sibai" and her avatar was a blue cat, which had not changed in so many years. Clicking on it, it was her transfer. A total of two thousand sixty-six dollars was transferred, divided twice. The first transfer was two thousand, and the second transfer was six hundred. There were a few words at the end: Don't come empty-handed. I accepted the money and returned the gesture with an OK gesture. She replied: The collection of money is quite fast. I replied with an honest smile.

;

;I made myself a bowl of noodles at noon. There was a handful of lettuce and two eggs in the refrigerator. I ate them together. After eating, I changed my outfit and went to the supermarket. At the end of the year, in the supermarket The place was packed with people, and the voices were mixed with the music on the radio, and they were full of joy. I bought some milk and honey with the 600 yuan funded by Wang Yu. When I saw melatonin on the shelf, I sent a message to Wang Yu: Do you want melatonin?

;

;She replied: Are you short-sighted?

;

;I didn’t reply, so I went to check out with milk and honey. It cost about three hundred yuan, and I could still pocket more than two hundred yuan.

;

;I arrived at her house at 6:30 pm as scheduled, and she sent me her location. It was not far away, only twenty minutes away. It was still early, so I threw my things in the car and wandered along the road. The car is a Chevrolet I bought from my dad for 30,000 yuan a few years ago. I made it clear when I borrowed it that I would pay it back. The car has traveled over 100,000 kilometers and if there is something wrong, it will not affect normal running on the road. I passed by a cigarette shop and bought a pack of soft Chinese. Wang Yu told me not to act too shabby and to dress up. Not to mention that I am among the best, but at least a middle-class elite. I think I might not be an old lady even if I wear a famous brand. If you know her, why not slap the soft Chinese in front of her face, and add that she smokes this every day, and she cannot get used to other things.

;

;A white sprinkler truck played "Orchid Grass" and drove slowly on the road. The water it sprayed was like a curtain. On the side of the road, an old man wearing a torn cotton jacket bent over and turned over a piece of garbage. Bucket, the sprinkler truck honked twice, but the old man didn't even look at it, so the sprinkler truck sprinkled water all over him with peace of mind. He was so angry that he followed the sprinkler truck for a hundred meters. I passed the traffic light and passed a gas station. On the small radio outside the gas station, a strong female voice kept shouting: Good news, great news. Get up today and stop to refuel. If you spend 200 yuan or more, you will get a box of mineral water for free. Get a fuel treasure for every RMB 500 purchase, first come first served. Good news, extremely good news... I glanced at the oil price, and it increased by 34 cents in 1992. Damn the international situation. Two hundred meters past the gas station is the Technician College. Wang Yu graduated from the Technician College. She even took me to eat at the Xiaobo Hotel at the west gate of the Technician College. She said she loved eating Xiaobo when she was in school. It was called Xiaobo Restaurant at that time. It's a shabby place, only 20 square meters, with just a few tables. The boss is called Xiaobo, and his specialty dishes are vinegar-soaked pork liver and ants growing on trees. We also ordered these two dishes when we ate at Xiaobo Hotel. The taste had changed. Wang Yu said no, it was not as delicious as before.

;

;I leaned against the outer wall of the Technician College, which was actually a large barbed wire fence. I took apart the cigarettes and lit one. Behind the barbed wire fence was the playground, where a group of people were playing football. Several people in exaggerated costumes walked towards me. Girls, we looked at each other across a barbed wire fence. We looked like animals being watched. A girl wearing bright lipstick, fishnet stockings, and earrings spoke to me: "Brother, please help me. Help me buy a pack of cigarettes, just fifteen dollars. ”

;

;After saying that, she slipped a twenty-yuan note through the mesh of the barbed wire fence. I didn’t accept it, so she added, “The remaining five dollars will be used as hard-earned money. Brother, please help me.” busy. ”

;

;I glanced at them and said, "Does your mother know?" ”

;

;She asked in confusion: “What do you know? ”

;

;I said: “Did you know you smoke? ”

;

;She withdrew the twenty yuan angrily and said, “Are you sick? ”

;

;I said: “Yes, high uric acid means either gout or uremia. ”

;

;They cursed and left angrily. I finished my cigarette and threw the cigarette butt towards the gas station, but was blown back by a gust of wind.

;

; 

;

;At 6:24 in the evening, I met Wang Yu who came to greet me at the main entrance of Guangfu Garden. I hadn’t seen him for a long time. His hair had grown longer and was dyed back. He wore black, and the rest was basically the same as before, except for a camel-colored trench coat. I was carrying milk and honey with a proud look on my face. She rolled her eyes at me and said, "Does this add up to six hundred?" Can't you buy some high-end goods? ”

;

;I said in a rogue manner: "I would like to bring a Chinese bottle of Moutai to your mother, is that fair?" ”

;

;She said: “This is worth three hundred and fifty at most, and you owe me two thousand two hundred and fifty. The friendship price is zero for you. ”

;

;Walking along a small road, there are scattered stalls on both sides of the road in the community, selling couplets, New Year paintings and various New Year goods. Wang Yu said: “I said you are doing this. As for cross-border trade, don’t let it slip. ”

;

;“Got it. ”

;

;Walking into the corridor and climbing the stairs to the third floor, Wang Yu took out the key and opened the anti-theft iron door and the Panpan wooden door one after another. The room was pitch dark. I didn’t see anything. I smelled it first. The smell of braised pork, Wang Yu turned on the light after entering the door, and saw a shriveled woman lying on an old man's chair, motionless, which startled me. Wang Yu said: "My mother." "I put the things on the ground and called aunt. Her mother blinked and agreed. I asked Wang Yu in a low voice: "What's wrong? ”

;

;“Cancer. ”

;

;“What kind of cancer? ”

;

;“Liver, intestines, lungs. ”

;

;“If you have all five poisons, you are a good guy. ”

;

;She punched me, walked to her mother, pointed at me and said, "Mom, someone is here." ”

;

;I walked to her mother, knelt down and called her aunt again. She slowly stretched out a hand, put it on my arm, rubbed it a few times, and used her hand so low that it almost The inaudible voice said to Wang Yu: "I have no appetite. You eat first. I will go back to bed and sleep for a while. I will eat again when I wake up." After saying that, she stood up tremblingly. Wang Yu helped her into the room. After a while, she came out and closed the door. I said, "You confessed in vain. Your mother didn't ask anything." ”

;

;She said: “I have been busy all afternoon eating. ”

;

;Braised pork, prawns, scrambled eggs with fungus, mapo tofu, and meatball soup. Wang Yu took out two cans of beer and said, "Would you like some?" ”I waved my hand and told her that the beer can’t come because the uric acid is high and she should eat as little prawns as possible.

;

;She said: "Then I will look for you and see if there is any other wine." ”

;

;I said: “Don’t waste any effort. Even if you don’t have it, there is no rule that you have to drink it when I come to your house. ”

;

;She said stubbornly: “Don't worry, sit down, there must be some. My dad has collected several bottles of French red wine for ten years. You are taking advantage today. ”

;

;I watched her rummaging through the cabinets, finding the study from the kitchen, and finding the bedroom from the study. Finally, she came over with two bottles of red wine. There was a string of unknown characters drawn on the label of the bottle, and below it was written The year is: 2011. She poured half a glass for herself and a glass for me. She didn’t use a goblet, just an ordinary glass wine glass, two by two and five. She touched one before officially starting to eat. She shook the glass in a decent manner and sipped. After taking a small sip, I, Zhu Bajie, drank it all like I was eating ginseng fruit. She scolded: "You idiot, please slow down. Are you using it as a drink?" Do you drink vintage wine like this? ”

;

;We each drank a bottle and started drinking. Wang Yu took out the cooking wine from the kitchen and each of us poured a glass. I said, "Your mother is like this and she's not in the hospital." ? ”

;

;She said: “It’s the same in the hospital. She wants to come back and doesn’t want to go through the trouble. ”

;

;Behind the dining table was a refrigerator, facing my face. I saw a photo posted on the refrigerator, a family of three, with Wang Yu standing in the middle. The man on the left must be Wang Yu’s father. I pointed to the photo and asked, "Is that man your dad?" ”

;

;She looked back and tore off the photo: “Say, Ang, it was taken in Ocean Park. I was twelve years old that year and during summer vacation, he said he would take us to the beach. Play. ”

;

;Wang Yu pressed the photo on the dining table. I took a closer look. Her father was indeed similar to what she described, but he didn’t look like he was 1.72 meters tall. Wang Yu raised his wine glass to signal. I was the one to take a sip, as if I was drinking red wine. After all, the taste of cooking wine was different from French red wine, and it was hard to swallow. She said, "Why is the big boss so bad that he even needs to borrow two thousand yuan?" What's up? ”

;

;I said: “Stop talking sarcastically. Don’t you know what’s going on with me? ”

;

;She said angrily: “Yes! Let you write a short essay to scold me! ”

;

;I was startled, scratched my head in embarrassment, and said, “You saw me. ”

;

;I feel ashamed to say that after I broke up with Wang Yu, I suddenly had a sudden surge of inspiration. I wrote a novel based on her and published it, depicting her as a selfish and short-sighted vulgar person. Not very kind, mainly because I didn’t expect it to be published. I didn't intend to be so derogatory to her, but when we broke up, she actually said to me, if you write, can you become Balzac if you write again? This is an insult to me. I didn’t think about Balzac. I just wanted to earn some royalties. This is my only source of income. If I’m lucky, I can publish one or two articles a month and earn thousands of dollars. , if you are unlucky, you will have nothing, and you will be hungry and full. Wang Yu once told me that if you can't do this, you will be useless. You still have to find a stable job.

;

;I was noncommittal, but what I was thinking was that I just couldn’t keep up my job, so I just stayed at home and wrote. I didn’t have to deal with people face to face, and the only communication was to send what I had written. Editor, say: Teacher, this is my new manuscript. The other party will reply with a message of receipt or directly compare their expressions, and give me feedback after a while. If it passes, I will say thank you. If it fails, I will not let go. After quitting my last job, I started writing. I had no choice but to survive. Fortunately, my composition skills were pretty good when I was in school and I could hold back my words. Over the past few years, I published a lot of them one after another, and I was also fired. Quite often, the editor responsible for reviewing my manuscripts often tells me, Mr. Li, our editorial department believes that the quality of your manuscripts is high, but sometimes the content presented is too dark and not suitable for publication. I wonder if you can Are there any changes in the content? I was also noncommittal, and when I submitted the next manuscript, it was still what they called "too dark."

;

;After drinking a third of the cooking wine, Wang Yu said to go and see her mother, took the wine glasses and poured the remaining contents of the two glasses into the sink. She said she couldn’t drink any more. I was asked to take this opportunity to go downstairs and buy two bottles of fruit-flavored Jiangxiaobai. I shook my head and asked, "Are you still drinking?" ”

;

;She said: “Drink, it’s so easy to drink and feel happy. ”

;

;I patted my head and said, “What if your mother wants to treat me like a drunkard? ”

;

;“She just likes Jiu Mengzi. ”

;

;I went downstairs to buy wine and bought four bottles of Jiangxiaobai with four different flavors. When I came back, all the stalls were gone, except for one selling peanuts and melon seeds, which was far away. I smelled the aroma of peanuts, so I bought a bag of peanuts to use with food and drinks. There are a few street lights on, but most of them don't work. I turn on one after walking for a while, which is quite good at resource planning. I was smoking a cigarette in the stairwell, and at this time I received a message from the editor that the manuscript was finished, and he also said, Teacher Li, I know what you wrote was a big news. I didn't go back and walked to Wang Yu's house. The door was closed. Before I opened it, I heard Wang Yu talking inside: "Oh my god, don't scare me." "Then there was Wang Yu's mother's strange scream, like a wolf at night, which made people's hair stand on end. I quickly pushed the door open and went in.

;

; 

;

;Wang Yu’s mother sat upright on the bed, panting rapidly, as if something was stuck in her throat. Wang Yu said over and over again in a hurry: " Mom, don't scare me, what's wrong with you? ”

;

;Her mother pushed her away and stared straight ahead. Then she got up from the bed, put on cotton slippers, walked around the room twice, and then walked towards the living room. He was mumbling as he walked, but I didn’t hear it clearly. It was like he was possessed, and it was a bit scary. I walked to the Buddhist niche on the balcony, pulled out a few incense sticks, and didn’t have the energy to press the lighter. He asked me to help, and I suddenly recovered. She was conscious and ran over to light the incense for her. She inserted the incense into the incense burner and bowed a few times. The water was flowing. Wang Yu held her arm and asked with a cry: "Mom, what's wrong?" ”

;

;She still said in an inaudible voice: “Jade, I just had a dream. ”

;

;It was originally a complete sentence, but she was out of breath and couldn't connect it. She paused for a while and said, "I dreamed about your dad." ”

;

;We helped her sit on the sofa. She calmed down for a few minutes, gained strength, and said, "Your dad asked us not to look for him again." Jade, then don’t go looking for him. ”

;

;Wang Yu said: "Okay, don't look for him. Mom, stop talking and have a rest." ”

;

;She waved her hand, coughed twice, and said, "If you don't tell me, there will be no chance. Yu, your dad is now relieved." Do you still remember when you were seven years old, I hired a master to practice at home? That's for your dad to get rid of evil spirits. Your dad is possessed by evil spirits. ”

;

;While panting, Wang Yu poured a glass of water and patted her back gently. She took the water glass without drinking it, but held it in her hand with a sad expression and continued: &ldquo ; 1999, I remember, on January 28, in the twelfth lunar month, it was snowing lightly that day. Your dad went to Langfang to buy goods. After dinner, he set off. I could tell you what I had eaten that night, chive pancakes and fried dumplings. Your father ate eight chive pancakes and twenty-three dumplings, and both of us were devoured in one meal. I was no longer working at that time, and your dad didn’t know how long he could work, but he could earn enough money for this trip. He said he would come back to eat mutton hot pot and cross the millennium together. ”

;

;At this point, she stopped and took a sip of water. I stood up and Wang Yu asked, "What are you doing?" ”

;

;I said: “Go out and smoke a cigarette. ”

;

;Her mother patted my leg and said, "It's okay, just smoke here." ”

;

;I said: “Not good. ”

;

;She said: “I am already like this, why do I still care about having one more cigarette? ”

;

;I sat down. There was no ashtray at home, so Wang Yu found an empty flowerpot for me and asked me to light the ashes.

;

;“Your dad came home at night on December 30th. He took a shower when he got home. There was no water heater at that time, so he took half a basin of cold water from the washbasin and mixed it with half a basin of hot water. Several pots, several bottles of boiling water were used up, and then I lay on the bed shivering. I asked him, are you cold? He didn't reply to me and slept until dawn. He suddenly yelled and sat up from the bed, which scared me awake. I was surprised. When I went to see him, he was covered in sweat, and the cotton sweater on his body was also stained with sweat. Soaked, I said, had a nightmare? Aren't you so bold? How could you still be scared by dreams? ”

;“还没有写完，有一段情节卡住了，不知道怎么连上，不过现在已经知道了。 ”

;

;她给了我一个鼓励的眼神，说：“加油。 ”

;

;我点了点头，跟她在春节前倒数第二天的午后阳光下分别，回家之后，我打开电脑，在卡住的地方飞快地补上了最后的情节，并且翻出故事的尾巴，重新写下了一行结束语。

;

;记忆是一块冰冷的金属，没有必要焐热它——那篇小说的结尾，我如是写道。这一行字几乎抽干了我的灵魂，我重重地躺在椅背上，片刻之后又坐直身子，按着鼠标将全文选定，没有任何犹豫，按下了删除键，然后默默地抽完了一支香烟，轻轻合上电脑。世界突然陷入了前所未有的寂静，在这寂静之中，我已泣不成声。
